ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This course is a wonderful introduction to addiction. I highly recommend it, especially to someone who has someone in their lives who has struggled with this issue.
This course will help you develop your knowledge of addiction science, though you'll have to think critically to get through it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Provided me with a more in depth base of knowledge about addiction research and mechanisms
This course was helpful in understanding individual differences in cognitive processes, especially those that support liking, reward, and incentive salience

This course really covered a breadth of information and covered both the foundations and new emergences in the field. Dr. Baskin-Sommers' emphasis on critical thinking will help me in my dissertation/research.
